original: Ljungberg, Carl-Johan, prost, Alingsås, f. 28/1/91 i Visby av skolfö-rest. O. N. Ljungberg o. Emma Segerdahl. G. 21 m. Greta Söderström. Barn: Maj f. 27. ~ Stud:ex. i Visby 10, teol. kand. i Upps., prakt. teol. prov samt prästv. i Skara 14. Kommin. i Liared 17, kyrkoh. i Norra Få-gelås 23, i Hova 28, kontr :prost 31, prost o. kyrkoh. i Alingsås sed. 40. Insp. f. samreadsk. i Alingsås sed. 44. LNO.
translated: Ljungberg, Carl-Johan, clergyman, from Alingsås, born on January 28, 1891 in Visby to school principal O.N. Ljungberg and Emma Segerdahl. Married on the 21st of an undisclosed month to Greta Söderström. Children: Maj, born in 1927. Completed high school in Visby in 1910, obtained a Bachelor's degree in Theology in Uppsala, passed practical theological exams and was ordained as a priest in Skara in 1914. Served as a curate in Liared from 1917, as a vicar in Norra Fågelås from 1923, in Hova from 1928, became archdeacon in 1931, and served as both archdeacon and vicar in Alingsås from 1940. Also worked as an inspector for church-related schools in Alingsås since 1944. Order of the North Star.
